medical_history.chief_complaint: Sudden onset, sharp, diffuse mid-abdominal pain.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient began to experience pain after dinner in the evening. He describes the pain as being likened to being punched in the stomach. The pain was aggravated by bending over and walking. He had an episode of diarrhea lasting about 10 minutes before feeling shaky and pale. This is the first episode of this type of pain, and he denies fever, nausea, and vomiting.
medical_history.family_history: Mother alive and healthy, father died of a brain tumor, 2 physically healthy siblings.
